data.name: Tailor-Hub Bootcamp - Challenge
data.description:
### Statement

The goal of the test is to obtain the history of the last transactions carried out by a company, in order to perform a series of operations and transformations so that the financial team can make business decisions.


The actions to be performed are:

1. Grouping by date of the same ones. The value for each of the groupings must be the total sum of the positive amounts transactions.ㅁ valid transaction is considered to be all those whose value of the amount is equal to or greater than zero. We will consider zero as a positive number. In this function you will receive as parameter an asynchronous function called **fetchTairlorApi** that will return the transaction array. It should return an object where each key is a date and each value is the total sum of the amounts.
2. Review the consistency and completeness of the transaction information. The restrictions for this data structure are as follows:
    - The date structure must be valid (YYYY-MM-DD).
    - The amount must correspond to a number.
    
    For test validation a `boolean` must be returned, returning `false` if any of them does not meet the requirements.
    
3. Create a function that returns an array by transaction type. The type `type` can be `international` or `national`.
4. Gets the average number of characters of international transaction descriptions without taking into account blanks.

To do so, four different functions will have to be performed for each of the actions:

```tsx

1 -> asyncAmountsGreaterThanOrEqualToZeroByDate
2 -> checkTransactionsDataType
3 -> filterTransactionsByType
4 -> getDescriptionCharsAverage

```


**Note**: An example of a transaction list is provided below.

```tsx
[
	{    
		id: 'a4f2b891-1921-4078-91ff-3dc5420a1e99',
    date: '2012-03-02',
    amount: 120,
    description:
      'Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihil impedit quo minus id quod maxime placeat facere possimus, omnis voluptas assumenda est, omnis dolor repellendus.',
    type: 'national',
    details: { owner: 'Freddi Raulston', address: 'PO Box 42702', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSM9RCN47WXX4BPK4FC' }
  },
  {
    id: 'da0efadd-7fac-4cc4-8c87-5735d6e732a0',
    date: '2003-07-11',
    amount: -20,
    description:
      'Temporibus autem quibusdam et aut officiis debitis aut rerum necessitatibus saepe eveniet ut et voluptates repudiandae sint et molestiae non recusandae.',
    type: 'national',
    details: { owner: 'Carin Burgher', address: 'Suite 20', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSPS9FCN2CTF85DYBB0' }
  },
  {
    id: 'e5577f65-095a-4a3e-be84-e0d57bfd9a31',
    date: '2000-07-28',
    amount: 1650,
    description:
      'Itaque earum rerum hic tenetur a sapiente delectus, ut aut reiciendis voluptatibus maiores alias consequatur aut perferendis doloribus asperiores repellat.',
    type: 'national',
    details: { owner: 'Ernest Summerskill', address: 'Room 1036', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSQJQVWA6DKPP9VGHKB' }
  }
]
```

**Examples** of functions by passing the example transaction;

```tsx

  // asyncAmountsGreaterThanOrEqualToZeroByDate -> 
  {
    2012-03-02: 120,
    2000-07-28: 1650
  }

  // checkTransactionsDataType ->
  true
  
  // filterTransactionsByType ( type 'international' ) ->
  [
    {    
      id: 'a4f2b891-1921-4078-91ff-3dc5420a1e99',
      date: '2012-03-02',
      amount: 120,
      description:
        'Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihil impedit quo minus id quod maxime placeat facere possimus, omnis voluptas assumenda est, omnis dolor repellendus.',
      type: 'international',
      details: { owner: 'Freddi Raulston', address: 'PO Box 42702', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSM9RCN47WXX4BPK4FC' }
    },
    {
      id: 'da0efadd-7fac-4cc4-8c87-5735d6e732a0',
      date: '2003-07-11',
      amount: -20,
      description:
        'Temporibus autem quibusdam et aut officiis debitis aut rerum necessitatibus saepe eveniet ut et voluptates repudiandae sint et molestiae non recusandae.',
      type: 'international',
      details: { owner: 'Carin Burgher', address: 'Suite 20', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSPS9FCN2CTF85DYBB0' }
    }
   ]
  
  // filterTransactionsByType ( type 'national' ) ->
  [
    {
      id: 'e5577f65-095a-4a3e-be84-e0d57bfd9a31',
      date: '2000-07-28',
      amount: 1650,
      description:
        'Itaque earum rerum hic tenetur a sapiente delectus, ut aut reiciendis voluptatibus maiores alias consequatur aut perferendis doloribus asperiores repellat.',
      type: 'national',
      details: { owner: 'Ernest Summerskill', address: 'Room 1036', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSQJQVWA6DKPP9VGHKB' }
    }
  ]
  
  // getDescriptionCharsAverage ->
  143.5
  
```

The test can be performed in either JavaScript or TypeScript, the latter being an added value to the test.

Enjoy coding 游

--- 

### Enunciado

El objetivo de la prueba consiste en obtener el hist칩rico de las 칰ltimas transacciones realizadas por una empresa, con el fin de realizar una serie de operaciones y transformaciones para que el equipo financiero pueda tomar decisiones de negocio. 


Las acciones que se deben realizar son:

1. Realizar una agrupaci칩n por fecha de las mismas. El valor por cada una de las agrupaciones debe ser la suma total de los importes positivos de las transacciones correspondientes.Se considera una transacci칩n v치lida todas aquellas cuyo valor del importe sea igual o mayor que 0. Consideraremos n칰mero positivo el zero. En esta funci칩n recibir치 como par치metro una funci칩n asyncrona  llamada **fetchTairlorApi** que te devolver치 el array de transacci칩nes. Deber치 devolver un objecto donde cada key sea una fecha y cada value sea la suma total de los amounts.
2. Revisar la coherencia e integridad de la informaci칩n de las transacciones. Las restricciones para esta estructura de datos son las siguientes:
    - La estructura de la fecha debe ser v치lido (YYYY-MM-DD).
    - El importe debe corresponderse con un n칰mero.
    
    Para la validaci칩n del test se debe devolver un `boolean` , retornando `false` si alguno de ellos no cumple los requisitos.
    
3. Crear una funci칩n que devuelva un array por tipo de transacci칩n. El tipo`type`맗uede ser`international` o`national`.
4. Obtiene el n칰mero medio de caracteres de las descripciones de las transacciones internacionales sin tener en cuenta los espacios en blanco.

Para ello se tendr치n que realizar cuatro funciones diferentes para cada una de las acciones:

```tsx

1 -> asyncAmountsGreaterThanOrEqualToZeroByDate
2 -> checkTransactionsDataType
3 -> filterTransactionsByType
4 -> getDescriptionCharsAverage

```

**Nota:** a continuaci칩n se facilita un ejemplo de lista de transacciones.

```tsx
[
	{    
		id: 'a4f2b891-1921-4078-91ff-3dc5420a1e99',
    date: '2012-03-02',
    amount: 120,
    description:
      'Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihil impedit quo minus id quod maxime placeat facere possimus, omnis voluptas assumenda est, omnis dolor repellendus.',
    type: 'international',
    details: { owner: 'Freddi Raulston', address: 'PO Box 42702', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSM9RCN47WXX4BPK4FC' }
  },
  {
    id: 'da0efadd-7fac-4cc4-8c87-5735d6e732a0',
    date: '2003-07-11',
    amount: -20,
    description:
      'Temporibus autem quibusdam et aut officiis debitis aut rerum necessitatibus saepe eveniet ut et voluptates repudiandae sint et molestiae non recusandae.',
    type: 'international',
    details: { owner: 'Carin Burgher', address: 'Suite 20', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSPS9FCN2CTF85DYBB0' }
  },
  {
    id: 'e5577f65-095a-4a3e-be84-e0d57bfd9a31',
    date: '2000-07-28',
    amount: 1650,
    description:
      'Itaque earum rerum hic tenetur a sapiente delectus, ut aut reiciendis voluptatibus maiores alias consequatur aut perferendis doloribus asperiores repellat.',
    type: 'national',
    details: { owner: 'Ernest Summerskill', address: 'Room 1036', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSQJQVWA6DKPP9VGHKB' }
  }
]

```

**Ejemplos** de las funciones pasando la transaacci칩n de ejemplo:

```tsx

  // asyncAmountsGreaterThanOrEqualToZeroByDate -> 
  {
    2012-03-02: 120,
    2000-07-28: 1650
  }

  // checkTransactionsDataType ->
  true
  
  // filterTransactionsByType ( type 'international' ) ->
  [
    {    
      id: 'a4f2b891-1921-4078-91ff-3dc5420a1e99',
      date: '2012-03-02',
      amount: 120,
      description:
        'Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihil impedit quo minus id quod maxime placeat facere possimus, omnis voluptas assumenda est, omnis dolor repellendus.',
      type: 'international',
      details: { owner: 'Freddi Raulston', address: 'PO Box 42702', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSM9RCN47WXX4BPK4FC' }
    },
    {
      id: 'da0efadd-7fac-4cc4-8c87-5735d6e732a0',
      date: '2003-07-11',
      amount: -20,
      description:
        'Temporibus autem quibusdam et aut officiis debitis aut rerum necessitatibus saepe eveniet ut et voluptates repudiandae sint et molestiae non recusandae.',
      type: 'international',
      details: { owner: 'Carin Burgher', address: 'Suite 20', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSPS9FCN2CTF85DYBB0' }
    }
   ]
  
  // filterTransactionsByType ( type 'national' ) ->
  [
    {
      id: 'e5577f65-095a-4a3e-be84-e0d57bfd9a31',
      date: '2000-07-28',
      amount: 1650,
      description:
        'Itaque earum rerum hic tenetur a sapiente delectus, ut aut reiciendis voluptatibus maiores alias consequatur aut perferendis doloribus asperiores repellat.',
      type: 'national',
      details: { owner: 'Ernest Summerskill', address: 'Room 1036', place_id: '01GQQ6NQSQJQVWA6DKPP9VGHKB' }
    }
  ]
  
  // getDescriptionCharsAverage ->
  143.5
  
```

La prueba puede realizarse tanto JavaScript como en TypeScript, siendo este 칰ltimo un valor a침adido a la prueba.

Enjoy coding 游
